'''v0.15.1 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition]]'', ''[[Gear VR Edition]]'', and the ''[[Windows 10 Edition]]'' Beta released on June 26-27, 2016 to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.15.0 alpha|v0.15.0]].

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=0.15.1
|;From released versions before 0.15.0
|7414|The player cannot cook acacia or dark oak logs in a furnace to get charcoal.
|8142|"Stitching" on block edges: graphical glitch.
|8877|Custom skins not working on Amazon Fire TV.
|10858|Reloading a world while in or ungrounded above lava will place the player at the next available platform.
|11833|Top snow cannot be seen in hand.
|12061|Cannot join external server over ethernet on Amazon FireTV.
|12540|Hopper texture bug.
|13325|Dyed leather armor in a dispenser changes to regular leather armor when the dispenser is broken.
|14279|Hotbar shifts to the right by very little when inventory is opened.
|14303|No damage taken when standing on a cactus.

|;From the 0.15.0 builds
|14544|When a player is next to a button, said player suffocates.
|15266|Player spawns in leaves after world creation.

|;From the 0.15.0 release
|15638|Missing audio if Realm is joined before a local world.
|15724|Pig inventory GUI closes within a half a second after opening it.
|15776|Client player spawns in leaves on multiplayer LAN.
|15797|Host is still seen riding a pig in multiplayer long after they dismount.

|;From the 0.15.1 build
|15527|Player cannot leave the bed bug
|15673|Enchantment table doesn't show letter particles.}}</onlyinclude>
